mapper.update: UPDATE Cinema_inform SET info_status='已读' where customer_id=#{customerId}
UPDATE Cinema_inform SET info_status='已读' where info_id=#{infoId}
mapper.select: SELECT mid.* from (select Cinema_inform.* , c.customer_name , messageCount from Cinema_inform INNER JOIN Cinema_customer c on c.customer_id=Cinema_inform.customer_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT count(if (info_status='未读',1,null)) 'messageCount', MAX(info_time) 'time' , customer_id FROM Cinema_inform GROUP BY customer_id ) t ON t.time=Cinema_inform.info_time AND t.customer_id=Cinema_inform.customer_id ORDER BY info_id DESC limit 99999999 ) mid GROUP BY mid.customer_id
select customer_name from Cinema_customer where customer_id=#{customerId}
